name: Deepnote
headline: A better data science notebook.
description:
Data science is as much a scientific and creative process as it is an engineering one. It involves working together, failing, learning and going back to the drawing board. Data scientists are explorers. To make data projects successful, we need tools that are both powerful and easy to use. Tools that help us collaborate and share our work in an engaging way. Tools that make data science fun again.

At Deepnote, we‚Äôre building a new standard in data tooling ‚Äî a notebook that brings teams together to explore, analyze and present data from start to finish.

We are building tools for explorers. Join us.

Introducing **notebooks** :
# The AI-powered  data workspace
  * Powered by  **GPT-4o** with the context from your data workspace
  * Turn **notebooks** into powerful **data apps** and **dashboards**
  * Combine **Python** , **SQL** , **R** , or don‚Äôt write code at all
  * Query **Snowflake** , **BigQuery** , **CSV** , and **50 more data sources**


[ Get started ‚Äì it‚Äôs free](https://www.deepnote.com/</sign-up>)
Book a demo
Watch demo (5 min)
### Any data sources
### AI suggestions
### Interactive dashboards
Loved by 100,000s of data professionals
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/static/media/features-section-background.d8deab8a.svg)
## AI superpowers for everydata analyst and data scientist
### Become a senior data analyst overnight
Describe what you want to do and Deepnote will automagically query, analyze, and interpret data for you. No coding skills necessary.
Deepnote understands your **business context** and your **data stack** to deliver high-quality analyses fast.
See in action
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-auto-ai.381f7fc7.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-ai-copilot.519288a6.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Write Python, SQL, R...
Enhance your productivity by using your favorite languages and tools in a single AI-enabled IDE.
![Deepnote notebook code blocks](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-python-sql-r.04226b79.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-ai-copilot.519288a6.png&w=3840&q=75)
### ...or let Python, SQL, R be written for you
Aware of your code, context, and metadata. Deepnote continuously adapts to turbocharge your work.
Refactor code
Generate code
Explain code
Code completion
Debug & fix
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-powered-by-ai-edit-code.e85cd24a.png&w=3840&q=75)
## From quick explorations to powerful data apps
  * Quick explorations
  * Notebooks
  * Data apps
  * Dashboards
  * ETL pipelines
  * Data catalog
  * Knowledge base
  * Sales report
  * Customer 360
  * Churn prediction model
  * Lead scoring
  * Sync Salesforce to Notion
  * A/B test evaluation
  * AWS cost analysis
  * NPS analysis
  * Fine-tune LLaMA 7B
  * Protein visualization
  * Forecast sales pipeline


### Interactive visualizations
Instantly visualize dataframes as no-code configurable charts.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-visualizations.67871727.png&w=2048&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/static/media/illustration-app-dashboard-background.fe56f4d7.svg)
### Beautiful apps & dashboards
Deepnote turns quick data explorations into impressive reports & apps. See some [examples](https://www.deepnote.com/</explore>).
Arrange into custom layouts
Hide code blocks
Add input blocks and buttons
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-app-dashboard.be70d0f5.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-schedule.e26bab8e.png&w=1920&q=75)
### Schedule notebooks
Schedule notebooks to run hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-deploy.54fe1dba.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Deploy notebooks as APIs
Put your notebook into production. Serve your models directly.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-machines.d16152a2.png&w=2048&q=75)
### Run on powerful GPUs
Choose what kind of hardware you want to use, from CPUs to big GPUs.
## Collaborate with the whole team
Deepnote runs seamlessly in the cloud, making environment management and collaboration with your team a non-issue. And sharing work is as easy as sending a link or email invite.
Product manager
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-1.ede7b8e7.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Organize your work
Build a library of data projects sorted by folders so teammates can get needed information fast.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-2.5c94f9f9.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Comment, review, version
Have your team comment on blocks to ask questions, provide feedback, and work faster.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-3.ebdb92d5.png&w=3840&q=75)
Data scientist
### Sharing made simple
Share your work with others by simply sending a link or email invite. Or use advanced permission models.
## 100s of integrations
Connect to your data in seconds with built-in integrations for the most popular warehouses, databases, and lakehouses.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-integrations.7df98c1c.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Based on open standards & extensible APIs
[See all integrations ‚Üí](https://www.deepnote.com/</integrations>)
### dbt metadata
Run your queries with Jinja in Deepnote‚Äôs SQL blocks and browse your company metrics right next to your warehouse schema.
### Drag and drop your CSVs
And use them like any other data source.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-csv.f0e62c00.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-spark-logo.5f2495a4.png&w=1200&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-spark-snowflake.cb2718dd.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Spark & Snowpark
Work with terabyte-scale data. Connect to your own cluster or spin up serverless Spark clusters on demand.
## Improve your data security with Deepnote
Security gets better and easier with Deepnote. Stop exporting CSVs and taking screenshots of sensitive data. With Deepnote, you have complete control over data access and security.
![AICPA SOC, HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA Compliance badges](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-compliance.3895212f.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Secure & compliant
All data is secure and encrypted. Deepnote is compliant with **HIPAA** and **SOC 2** , **GDPR** , and more.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-directory-sync.888d3c0c.png&w=3840&q=75)
### RBAC, SSO, directory sync
Control who can access data and code. Enjoy single sign-on via SAML or OIDC connections and sync your directory.
![icons of various cloud providers](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-custom-deployments.f28525ba.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Custom deployments
Get a secure, compliant, and fully managed Deepnote instance or book a demo to learn about all deployment options.
### What makes Deepnote so secure?
Discover how we mitigate risks and protect your data using industry best practices and continuous improvements.
[Read more about security](https://www.deepnote.com/<https:/security.deepnote.com>)
Talk to our security engineers
![Deepnote security book](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-deepnote-security.031def66.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Loved by a community of 300,000+ data pros

## AI superpowers for everydata analyst and data scientist
### Become a senior data analyst overnight
Describe what you want to do and Deepnote will automagically query, analyze, and interpret data for you. No coding skills necessary.
Deepnote understands your **business context** and your **data stack** to deliver high-quality analyses fast.
See in action
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-auto-ai.381f7fc7.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-ai-copilot.519288a6.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Write Python, SQL, R...
Enhance your productivity by using your favorite languages and tools in a single AI-enabled IDE.
![Deepnote notebook code blocks‚ü®6‚ü©]
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-ai-copilot.519288a6.png&w=3840&q=75)
### ...or let Python, SQL, R be written for you
Aware of your code, context, and metadata. Deepnote continuously adapts to turbocharge your work.
Refactor code
Generate code
Explain code
Code completion
Debug & fix
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-powered-by-ai-edit-code.e85cd24a.png&w=3840&q=75)
## From quick explorations to powerful data apps
  * Quick explorations

Choose what kind of hardware you want to use, from CPUs to big GPUs.
## Collaborate with the whole team
Deepnote runs seamlessly in the cloud, making environment management and collaboration with your team a non-issue. And sharing work is as easy as sending a link or email invite.
Product manager
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-1.ede7b8e7.png&w=3840&q=75)

Build a library of data projects sorted by folders so teammates can get needed information fast.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-2.5c94f9f9.png&w=3840&q=75)

Have your team comment on blocks to ask questions, provide feedback, and work faster.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-collaboration-3.ebdb92d5.png&w=3840&q=75)
Data scientist
### Sharing made simple
Share your work with others by simply sending a link or email invite. Or use advanced permission models.
## 100s of integrations
Connect to your data in seconds with built-in integrations for the most popular warehouses, databases, and lakehouses.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-integrations.7df98c1c.png&w=3840&q=75)
### Based on open standards & extensible APIs
See all integrations ‚Üí‚ü®8‚ü©
### dbt metadata
Run your queries with Jinja in Deepnote‚Äôs SQL blocks and browse your company metrics right next to your warehouse schema.
### Drag and drop your CSVs
And use them like any other data source.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-csv.f0e62c00.png&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-spark-logo.5f2495a4.png&w=1200&q=75)
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-spark-snowflake.cb2718dd.png&w=1200&q=75)
### Spark & Snowpark
Work with terabyte-scale data. Connect to your own cluster or spin up serverless Spark clusters on demand.
## Improve your data security with Deepnote
Security gets better and easier with Deepnote. Stop exporting CSVs and taking screenshots of sensitive data. With Deepnote, you have complete control over data access and security.
![AICPA SOC, HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA Compliance badges‚ü®9‚ü©]
### Secure & compliant
All data is secure and encrypted. Deepnote is compliant with **HIPAA** and **SOC 2** , **GDPR** , and more.
![](https://www.deepnote.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fillustration-directory-sync.888d3c0c.png&w=3840&q=75)
### RBAC, SSO, directory sync
Control who can access data and code. Enjoy single sign-on via SAML or OIDC connections and sync your directory.
![icons of various cloud providers‚ü®10‚ü©]
### Custom deployments
Get a secure, compliant, and fully managed Deepnote instance or book a demo to learn about all deployment options.
### What makes Deepnote so secure?
Discover how we mitigate risks and protect your data using industry best practices and continuous improvements.
Read more about security‚ü®11‚ü©
Talk to our security engineers

generated_description:
**Deepnote: Transforming Data Science Collaboration**

Deepnote's mission is straightforward yet powerful: to create a better data science notebook that enhances collaboration and makes data exploration enjoyable again. Founded during Y Combinator's Batch S19, Deepnote recognizes that data science is not merely technical‚Äîit‚Äôs a blend of creativity, experimentation, and teamwork. The company understands the challenges of the data scientist's journey‚Äî the need for sophisticated yet user-friendly tools that allow teams to work together seamlessly.

At its core, Deepnote offers an innovative platform that facilitates the entire data project lifecycle, from analysis to presentation. Here are the standout features that make it a go-to for data professionals:

1. **AI Empowered Workspaces**: Built with GPT technology, Deepnote allows users to describe their analytical goals and automatically generates the necessary queries, analyses, and interpretations‚Äîno coding experience required!

2. **Multi-language Support**: Whether your preference is Python, SQL, R, or even a code-free approach, Deepnote provides a versatile IDE that caters to all.

3. **Interactive Dashboards**: Users can create visually appealing reports and applications on-the-fly, enhancing the presentation of data insights.

4. **Collaboration Made Easy**: The platform operates in the cloud, allowing for effortless sharing and feedback among teams. You can invite colleagues with a link, making it easy to work together on projects.

5. **Integration Capabilities**: With support for numerous data sources, including popular warehouses and databases, Deepnote simplifies data connections, keeping your workflow efficient.
